p: In the case of umifenovir (an active antiviral against influenza, approved only in China and Russia), its use in COVID-19 is promising; according to ongoing Chinese studies, it could lead to a lower mortality rate. A randomized study compared umifenovir with another promising antiviral, favipiravir, which resulted in a higher cure rate after 7 days of treatment in moderate cases of COVID-19 (71.4% in the favipiravir group, compared to 55.9% in the umifenovir group) ( 80).
